Talk_56:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Cece's shop is to the left of the village
entrance. It's the stylish <clr:0000>shop with the
mushroom-clothing decoration<clr:ffff>!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS>Cece set up her own Cece-brand line.
It proves what a fantastically avant-garde,
<clr:0000>charismatic designer <clr:ffff>she is!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Why, Cece's single-handedly set the tone
for Hateno Village's whole look!
Talk_57: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Amira, look! That hat!<sp:0:4:0>It's a limited-edition C-Cece hat!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Hey, you! Don't stand there and act like
you're not eavesdropping! We see you!
Talk_58:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh my! <sp:5:0:0>Why would some vagabond have a
limited-edition hat?! <sp:5:1:0>This is an outrage!<sp:5:0:0>
Simply outrageous, I tell you!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh_00>Then again... Cece hands those out at her
discretion, and who are we to second-
guess her?<sp:0:4:0>Besides...
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_01>Who are you supposed to be? Whoever
you are, don't stand there and act like
you're not eavesdropping! We see you!
Talk_24: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Oh, do you know what I heard?
Talk_70:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>Oh, a traveler—and a fashionable one,
at that! Come over and join us for some
idle conversation!
Talk_71:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh...what did you change your clothes
for? If you've no interest in fashion, then
I've no interest in you.<sp:0:4:0>Now, if you were to switch to a <clr:0000>Cece-
brand <clr:ffff>outfit, then we wouldn't have
this problem.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>At the very least, you could <clr:0000>dye <clr:ffff>those
clothes at the dye shop. Oooh! Or maybe
put on a <clr:0000>fully matching outfit<clr:ffff>.
Talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Of course. You're talking about the place
at the <clr:0000>top of the eastern hill<clr:ffff> where that
cute head researcher used to live, right?
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble_01>Get with the times and put on some
<clr:0000>Cece-brand clothes<clr:ffff> already! How else will
anyone know your loyalty to Cece style?
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>I don't know what I'd do if I didn't have
cute things to distract me all day long.<sp:0:4:0>This hat does look good on me, right?
What do you think?
Talk_73:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Burglars get no mercy from me!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Wait. You're no thief. You're just another
traveler. <sp:5:0:0>Why'd you have to go and scare
me like that?!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Who's she running against? <clr:0000>Reede<clr:ffff>?
He's nice enough...but he's outclassed
in every way this time.<sp:0:4:0>If you ask me, Cece's got this election all
sewn up!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_74:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Tired_01>Oh, come on. Not you again.<sp:0:4:0>Whatever. If you like the place so much,
go and make yourself at home, I guess.
Talk_29:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Think>Walk around the village looking like that
if you want, but don't blame me when
<clr:0000>Cece <clr:ffff>roasts your fashion sense!
Talk_75:
If you're feeling plain, shabby, or drab,
Cece has the cure! <sp:5:1:0>Go ask her to
coordinate your look today!
Talk_40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>Mm-hmm. <sp:5:0:0>That kind of gossip can make
a big splash in the run-up to an election.
Talk_43:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>That's as much as I could get out of
Sophie. She seemed relieved about it.<sp:0:4:0>Was it ever true? <sp:5:0:0>I guess you can't
believe everything you hear.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>She's so fashionable but knows her way
around a vegetable field. In so many
respects, she's just like you and me!
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You're here for my favorite time of day!
Isn't it pretty the way the light hits the
Cece decorations put up everywhere?
Talk_47:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Ah, that's right! Speaking of Cece, do you
know what I heard?
Talk_48:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Cece's success has made Hateno Village
famous in every corner of the land!
Talk_60:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry_00>Are you still there?! Find somewhere else
to stand—someplace out of earshot of our
PRIVATE conversation!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad_01>This rain, huh? It's good for the crops
but bad for expensive outfits.
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>What's all the commotion? Did something
happen at Cece's shop?<sp:0:4:0>Oh, that's right, they posted a special
article earlier. Maybe I can find out more
if I check the village <clr:0000>bulletin board<clr:ffff>.
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Look, Amira! Someone who forgot to put
on his <clr:0000>Cece-brand <clr:ffff>outfit today!
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>If your lack of clothes is supposed to be
some protest against fashion, you're only
making yourself look like a fool.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Wakeup>*yaaawn* Hey! The polite thing to do
when a lady yawns is to avert your eyes!
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseM_00>Hold on! Is this something you want our
eavesdropper to overhear?
Talk_64:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>He's dressed in Cece-brand clothes,
isn't he?<sp:0:4:0>I don't see a problem with true fans like
him knowing.
Talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Sorry, I'm on my way to meet someone.
If you need a tour guide, you'll have to
ask someone else.
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>That reminds me, I heard a rumor that
<clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> has been meeting in secret with
someone night after night!
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm on my way to work. We all have to
work hard when we're young so we can
reap the benefits when we're old!
Talk_66: <sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>Well, well. It takes all kinds, I suppose.
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_01>Are you another traveler here to see
<clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>? Our village gets more famous
all the time!
Talk_67:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That's right. The quickest way to prove
you're a man of culture and taste is to
outfit yourself in <clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> clothing.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>You could also try <clr:0000>dyeing<clr:ffff> your outfit at
the dye shop—<sp:5:1:0>or maybe you'd prefer to
wear a <clr:0000>full set<clr:ffff> of matching clothes?
Talk_33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_01>My friend and I were just having a very
important conversation.<sp:0:4:0>Although...<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you come back once you've gained
some basic fashion sense, we might let
a fellow Cece fan join in our chat.
Talk_68:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But don't you see, Nikki? <sp:5:0:0>He's dressed in
a <clr:0000>full set of matching clothes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>What could be the problem with including
such a fashionable fellow in our inner
circle, hmm?
Talk_69:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But don't you see, Nikki? <sp:5:0:0>He's gone to
the trouble to color his outfit with those
wonderful <clr:0000>Hateno dyes<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>What could be the problem with including
such a fashionable fellow in our inner
circle, hmm?
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Chat_00>Say, have you heard the rumors about
Cece's secret meetings? Supposedly,
they've been happening in that silo!
Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>What? Why there? There's nothing
romantic or intriguing about a silo!<sp:0:4:0>Hmm. Do I care anymore who she's been
meeting there?
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>What's this about "agricultural
development"? Tradition is important,
of course, but...
Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>That's the one. <sp:5:0:0>What I heard is that a
<clr:0000>weird old man<clr:ffff> is living there now.<sp:0:4:0>You know Tokk, right? He often takes
walks near that lab.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Trouble>And he told me that he's heard strange
sounds and unintelligible shouting from
inside the place.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Between you and me, I'm wondering if it
hasn't become a lair for monsters.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>Just like we thought, Cece is the front-
runner in the mayoral election.
Talk_38:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Right! And then that <clr:0000>weird old man <clr:ffff>took
her place for a while, remember?<sp:0:4:0>Well, they say a voice called to him
directly from Hyrule Castle and now
he's working at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>!
Talk_50:
<sp:3:0:2:0200><snd:Angry>Urrrgh! My hat's getting soaked! Move
out of my way before it's ruined!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>It's almost time for the election. Cece is
our favorite to win in a landslide!
Talk_39:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>What I wouldn't give to have my love life
plastered all over the papers!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>Although I can see why <clr:0000>Sophie<clr:ffff> <clr:0000>is worried<clr:ffff>.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Trouble>It's too bad Cece decided to withdraw
from the mayoral election in the end.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>But knowing that she's fond of Hateno's
vegetables and respects her roots only
makes me love her more!
Talk_51:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Summoned to the castle, you say?! He
must be a very important man indeed!<sp:0:4:0>I can see how someone like that would
attract such a lovely, young wife.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>Speaking of his family, it sounds like their
son, Granté, moved to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff>—that
village northeast of here.<sp:0:4:0>They tell me he's so desperate for a job
that he even changed his name! Don't ask
me to what though.
Talk_52:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Ahahaha! Don't be silly! That shouting he
heard is probably just old <clr:0000>Robbie<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>He often says things no one understands.
No doubt it's the influence of that young
wife of his!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>Speaking of his family, it sounds like their
son, Granté, moved to Tarrey Town—that
village northeast of here.<sp:0:4:0>They tell me he's so desperate for a job
that he even changed his name! Don't ask
me to what though.
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My Nebb and Narah are getting big.
I haven't figured out what to make them
for lunch tomorrow!<sp:0:4:0>They need to eat well, sleep well, and
learn well. That's the way to raise a kid.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>'s got my vote. Imagine the styles
she'd grace our village with if she ended
up as mayor!
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'd better be getting back home. My
husband worries about me if I stay out
too late!
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait. <sp:5:0:0>You're not wearing what I think
you're wearing, are you? <sp:5:0:0>Is that a
limited-edition Cece hat?!<sp:0:4:0>Cece only gives those out to people in
high esteem. What in the world did you
do to deserve one?
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That hat you've got on is too chic for you.
Why don't you trade it for mine?
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh reeeally? Now that's the kind of
behavior that gets people talking! I wish
somebody would gossip about me...
